TopicTitle: Lurker peeking out of the closet

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Been lurking and playing since KSP 0.20...

Lots of good tips on the forum, so I have learnt a lot and have little to add.

Found KSP via a youtube comment on the spectacular failed Proton-M launch, and have made many re-enactments since.

Also living within 20 minutes on bicycle of Copenhagen Suborbitals has triggered my interest.

Kind regards,

Norup
Welcome to the forums!! The proton launch was a tragedy Well we hope you enjoy yourself on the forums.

Welcome aboard!

You may proceed with your regularly scheduled lurking.
